entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming west 20 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
